title: New beta client is really slow?
body: Hello! Let's get straight to the "problem", when I downloaded the new beta client and logged in, and let everything load. But, when I started to move my mouse I realised that the client was really slow and it was really laggy, now I haven't really seen any other posts on this and it's most likely just my really bad laptop but I'm just curious to know, is anyone else getting this "problem" too?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried disabling animations in the new client? This can be done from the first page of settings in the client.
Sorry for the late reply, but yes I have but it is still really slow again, most likely just my laptop.
Same issues here. When I join an ARAM game the lobby takes forever to load, leaving me with roughly 15 seconds to see what champ I have and sort out my R/M.
I find that it consumes two or three times as much CPU as the previous one. Multitasking takes its toll.
